job.title: UI Software Engineer
job.description: ResponsibilitiesContribute to flagship products as part of a creative cross-functional teamWork closely together with design team and UI/UX experts and leverage design as code concept.Building automated frameworks for safe production deployments which can easily be maintained and operated by SRE'sAlways learn and bring new concepts and technology to your teamRequirementsWork experience in some of the following areas: Javascript, Typescript, Python, Rest APIs, React, Angular, Produce front-end code and visual components to create a polished and highly functional user interface with a focus on usability and simplicity of designEager to learn enough about whatever tools or tricks are needed to make things workCares about readable, performant, reliable, and secure codeUI developer that designs, develops, tests, reviews code, documents and deploys3+ years of experienceYour Key InterestsMobile development, using cross platform UI design and codeFollowing latest trends on UI technologies, and UI development processesAutomated testing of UI functionalityCloud environments such as AWS, Google Cloud Platform and Azure
